name: International Conference on Slavonic and East European Studies
content: International Conference on Slavonic and East European Studies 25-26 November 2016 â€“ Warsaw, Poland organised by Interdisciplinary Research Foundation Keynote speaker: Dr. Beth Holmgren, Duke University (USA) The conference is addressed to scholars, researchers and professionals who are interested in gaining a deeper knowledge and understanding of Eastern Europe across a range of disciplines including history, politics, economics, international relations, society and culture. The languages of the conference are English and Russian. All delegates will receive a printed book of abstracts and an e-Book with all conference papers and an ISBN number. Conference panels will be related, but not limited, to: history, law and political sciences philosophy and sociology economics and international relations literatures and cultures linguistics and translation architecture and design anthropology and ethnography media and communication education and youth policies In order to submit a paper or poster proposal, please fill in the form by 10 August 2016\. The notifications from the Conference Committee will be sent by 20 August 2016.
